misc: Rarely seen on the course without a drink in his hand
biography: Martin, a familiar face at the Hector Trophée, brings a blend of experience and joviality to the greens. Representing St. Laurence Golf, Martin is rarely seen on the course without a drink in hand, embodying a relaxed yet competitive spirit.

With nine past appearances, Martin's familiarity with the nuances of the tournament is undeniable. He has secured one victory at the Hector Trophée, demonstrating his ability to perform under pressure and in the pairs format. In addition to his pairs success, Martin has also claimed the Victor Trophy, awarded to the tournament's best individual player, showcasing his all-around capabilities.

As he gears up for his tenth appearance in the upcoming Hector Trophée 2025, Martin remains an active and engaging presence in the Hector community. His blend of skill and lightheartedness makes him a compelling player to watch.
